body_html: I am closing this issue now, as the original posters goals were to add more functionality, and we did. Specifically, we added the most commonly needed types (backed the op MirrorPad) several months ago. If the more exotic numpy.pad types of padding are needed, please file a new bug referring to this one. However, if somebody implements a new type they need and makes it perform well, we will accept the patch.

body: I am closing this issue now, as the original posters goals were to add more functionality, and we did. Specifically, we added the most commonly needed types (backed the op MirrorPad) several months ago. If the more exotic numpy.pad types of padding are needed, please file a new bug referring to this one. However, if somebody implements a new type they need and makes it perform well, we will accept the patch.
